response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and I believe it could be incredibly valuable to you, given its worth of $12,000 to you. I understand the importance of value alignment when making such significant purchases, so I would like to offer you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is still significantly above market value but below its perceived worth to you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
